verses.verse: For <S%G1063><s%> yourselves, <S%G846><s%> brethren, <S%G80><s%> know <S%G1492><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> entrance in <S%G1529><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> you, <S%G5209><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> it was <S%G1096><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> in vain: <S%G2756><s%>

But <S%G235><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> after that we had suffered before, <S%G4310><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> were shamefully entreated, <S%G5195><s%> as <S%G2531><s%> ye know, <S%G1492><s%> at <S%G1722><s%> Philippi, <S%G5375><s%> we were bold <S%G3955><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> to speak <S%G2980><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> gospel <S%G2098><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> much <S%G4183><s%> contention. <S%G73><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> exhortation <S%G3874><s%> was not <S%G3756><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> deceit, <S%G4106><s%> nor <S%G3761><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> uncleanness, <S%G167><s%> nor <S%G3777><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> guile: <S%G1388><s%>

But <S%G235><s%> as <S%G2531><s%> we were allowed <S%G1381><s%> of <S%G5259><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> to be put in trust <S%G4100><s%> with the <S%G3588><s%> gospel, <S%G2098><s%> even so <S%G3779><s%> we speak; <S%G2980><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> pleasing <S%G700><s%> men, <S%G444><s%> but <S%G235><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> which trieth <S%G1381><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> hearts. <S%G2588><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> neither <S%G3777><s%> at any time <S%G4218><s%> used we flattering words, <S%G1096><s%> <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3056><s%> <S%G2850><s%> as <S%G2531><s%> ye know, <S%G1492><s%> nor <S%G3777><s%> a cloak <S%G4392><s%> of covetousness; <S%G4124><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> is witness: <S%G3144><s%>

Nor <S%G3777><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> men <S%G444><s%> sought <S%G2212><s%> we glory, <S%G1391><s%> neither <S%G3777><s%> of <S%G575><s%> you, <S%G5216><s%> nor <S%G3777><s%> yet of <S%G575><s%> others, <S%G243><s%> when we might <S%G1410><s%> have been <S%G1511><s%> burdensome, <S%G1722><s%> <S%G922><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> the apostles <S%G652><s%> of Christ. <S%G5547><s%>

But <S%G235><s%> we were <S%G1096><s%> gentle <S%G2261><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3319><s%> you, <S%G5216><s%> even as <S%G5613><s%> <S%G302><s%> a nurse <S%G5162><s%> cherisheth <S%G2282><s%> her <S%G1438><s%> children: <S%G5043><s%>

So <S%G3779><s%> being affectionately desirous <S%G2442><s%> of you, <S%G5216><s%> we were willing <S%G2106><s%> to have imparted <S%G3330><s%> unto you, <S%G5213><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> gospel <S%G2098><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> only, <S%G3440><s%> but <S%G235><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> our own <S%G1438><s%> souls, <S%G5590><s%> because <S%G1360><s%> ye were <S%G1096><s%> dear <S%G27><s%> unto us. <S%G2254><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> ye remember, <S%G3421><s%> brethren, <S%G80><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> labor <S%G2873><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> travail: <S%G3449><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> laboring <S%G2038><s%> night <S%G3571><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> day, <S%G2250><s%> because we would not <S%G3361><s%> be chargable <S%G1912><s%> unto any <S%G5100><s%> of you, <S%G5216><s%> we preached <S%G2784><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> gospel <S%G2098><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>

Ye <S%G5210><s%> are witnesses, <S%G3144><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> also, how <S%G5613><s%> holily <S%G3743><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> justly <S%G1346><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> unblamably <S%G274><s%> we behaved ourselves <S%G1096><s%> among you <S%G5213><s%> that believe: <S%G4100><s%>

As <S%G2509><s%> ye know <S%G1492><s%> how <S%G5613><s%> we exhorted <S%G3870><s%> <S%G5209><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> comforted <S%G3888><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> charged <S%G3140><s%> every <S%G1538><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> of you, <S%G5216><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> a father <S%G3962><s%> doth his <S%G1438><s%> children, <S%G5043><s%>

That ye <S%G5209><s%> would walk <S%G4043><s%> worthy <S%G516><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> who hath called <S%G2564><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> his <S%G1438><s%> kingdom <S%G932><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> glory. <S%G1391><s%>

For this cause <S%G1223><s%> <S%G5124><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> thank <S%G2168><s%> we <S%G2249><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> without ceasing, <S%G89><s%> because, <S%G3754><s%> when ye received <S%G3880><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> which ye heard <S%G189><s%> of <S%G3844><s%> us, <S%G2257><s%> ye received <S%G1209><s%> it not <S%G3756><s%> as the word <S%G3056><s%> of men, <S%G444><s%> but <S%G235><s%> as <S%G2531><s%> it is <S%G2076><s%> in truth, <S%G230><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> effectually worketh <S%G1754><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> you <S%G5213><s%> that believe. <S%G4100><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> ye, <S%G5210><s%> brethren, <S%G80><s%> became <S%G1096><s%> followers <S%G3402><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> churches <S%G1577><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> which in <S%G1722><s%> Judea <S%G2449><s%> are <S%G5607><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus: <S%G2424><s%> for <S%G3754><s%> ye <S%G5210><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> have suffered <S%G3958><s%> like things <S%G5024><s%> of <S%G5259><s%> your own <S%G2398><s%> countrymen, <S%G4853><s%> even as <S%G2531><s%> they <S%G846><s%> have <S%G2532><s%> of <S%G5259><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Jews: <S%G2453><s%>

Who both killed <S%G615><s%> <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> their own <S%G2398><s%> prophets, <S%G4396><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> have persecuted <S%G1559><s%> us; <S%G2248><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> they please <S%G700><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> are contrary <S%G1727><s%> to all <S%G3956><s%> men: <S%G444><s%>

Forbidding <S%G2967><s%> us <S%G2248><s%> to speak <S%G2980><s%> to the <S%G3588><s%> Gentiles <S%G1484><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> they might be saved, <S%G4982><s%> to fill up <S%G378><s%> their <S%G848><s%> sins <S%G266><s%> always: <S%G3842><s%> for <S%G1161><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> wrath <S%G3709><s%> is come <S%G5348><s%> upon <S%G1909><s%> them <S%G846><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> the uttermost. <S%G5056><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> we, <S%G2249><s%> brethren, <S%G80><s%> being taken <S%G642><s%> from <S%G575><s%> you <S%G5216><s%> for <S%G4314><s%> a short time <S%G5610><s%> <S%G2540><s%> in presence, <S%G4383><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> in heart, <S%G2588><s%> endeavored <S%G4704><s%> the more abundantly <S%G4056><s%> to see <S%G1492><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> face <S%G4383><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> great <S%G4183><s%> desire. <S%G1939><s%>

Wherefore <S%G1352><s%> we would <S%G2309><s%> have come <S%G2064><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> you, <S%G5209><s%> even <S%G3303><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> Paul, <S%G3972><s%> <S%G2532><s%> once and again; <S%G530><s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G1364><s%> but <S%G2532><s%> Satan <S%G4567><s%> hindered <S%G1465><s%> us. <S%G2248><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> is our <S%G2257><s%> hope, <S%G1680><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> joy, <S%G5479><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> crown <S%G4735><s%> of rejoicing? <S%G2746><s%> Are <S%G2228><s%> not <S%G3780><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> ye <S%G5210><s%> in the presence <S%G1715><s%> of our <S%G2257><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> at <S%G1722><s%> his <S%G846><s%> coming? <S%G3952><s%>
